title: King Dauids vow for reformation of himselfe. his family. his kingdome Deliuered in twelue sermons before the Prince his Highnesse vpon Psalm 101. By George Hakewill Dr. in Diuinity.
author: Hakewill, George, 1578-1649.
publisher: Printed [by Humphrey Lownes] for Mathew Lownes,
notes: The title page is engraved and signed "RE scul" i.e. Renold Elstracke.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
